xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="key" select="//Adapters/Adapter_Invocation_Mechanism_Mappings/mappings/adapter-name[@invocation-mechanism='${invocation mechanism}']/text()" /> <xsl:variable name="adapterName" select="//Adapters/*[name() = $key]/text()" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space($adapterName)) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="$adapterName" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">NOT FOUND</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <connection-details> <invocation-mechanism>${invocation mechanism}</invocation-mechanism> <adapter-name>${adapter name}</adapter-name> <timeout>${timeout}</timeout> <enable-psremoting>${enable psremoting}</enable-psremoting> <hostname> <xsl:value-of select="//component/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </hostname> <username> <xsl:value-of select="concat(//component/@name, "\", //username/text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </username> <xsl:copy-of select="//password" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="//adapter-options/*" mode="adapter-options" /> </connection-details> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="adapter-options"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Convert incoming target connection data to XML that can be accepted by AD utilities.
